Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Thai \Thai\ (t[imac]), n. The language of Thailand (Siam); it is a member of the Tai group of languages. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Thai \Thai\ (t[imac]), a. Of or pertaining to the Thai language, a member of the Tai group of languages. [PJC]
2. Of or pertaining to Thailand or its people. [PJC]

Thai adj 1: of or relating to or characteristic of Thailand or its people; "Siamese kings"; "different Thai tribes live in the north" [syn: {Tai}, {Siamese}] 2: of or relating to the languages of the Thai people; "Thai tones" [syn: {Tai}, {Siamese}] 3: of or relating to Thailand; "the Thai border with Laos" [syn: {Tai}, {Siamese}] n 1: a native or inhabitant of Thailand [syn: {Tai}, {Siamese}] 2: a branch of the Tai languages [syn: {Siamese}, {Central Thai}]
